name: .VPA File Extension
summary: Learn about .VPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Gesture file used by VPchat (Virtual Places Chat) and the older Excite Super Chat Alpha program; contains animations with sound that can be displayed in a user's chat bubble; allows for more expressive emotions than static emoticons.

content: VPA files must be saved in the gestures folder within the the program folder in order to be used by the chat program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
